lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired gentlemen, who is attempting to do something positive for other people, where ever they may reside in this world.

lenders.name: McKee
lenders.loan_because: The children are learning it really is better to give than to receive.
lenders.occupational_info: This group of children were given this donation in lieu of Xmas gifts at our annual Christmas party to help another family.

lenders.name: Ken Chan
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in sustainable capacity building, and that the best gift of humanity one can offer to another thousands of miles away is hope and opportunity. 

I travelled to Ecuador in June '07 as part of a World Council of Credit Unions delegation, and saw first hand how micro credit has improved the lives of local entrepreneurs. The photo you see here is that of Margarita. I visited her farm outside the town of Nabon. With the help of micro loans from Cooperativa de Ahorro y Credito Jardin Azuayo, Margarita and her husband Geranomo were able to build a small chicken and guinea pig farm. She is now able to send her two older children to college and her younger daughter (pictured here) to primary school.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in various levels of government in Canada and the United Kingdom. Today, I'm the Vice President, Advocacy, Research and Healthcare at Cystic Fibrosis Canada.

lenders.name: Tim / Kelsey
lenders.loan_because: i know that it is the right thing to do and that only 25 dollars can change someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: we loan because we want to.

lenders.name: Curt
lenders.loan_because: Social justice...helping out your neighbor...we are all neighbors.

lenders.name: Intrust IT
lenders.loan_because: We value empathy and happiness.  We empathize with people all over the world trying to improve their situation, and we want them to achieve their dreams and be happy.
lenders.occupational_info: We provide IT services to small and medium sized companies.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: Because people need a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with cancer manage their illness

My small contribution through this wonderful organization goes a long way and can make a huge difference to deserving entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked with computers as an engineer then in marketing, sales and management. My strength is in managing projects. I will soon begin a company and I pray that the support I wish for all others is sent my way,

The Baugher Sisters:

me (Barbra):  I go to school where I am learning about government and nonprofits organizations - I want to make the world a better place for everyone.  I am married and I have one son named Cameron. 

Becca: Becca works at an elementary school taking care of children with special needs.  She is married and has four daughters - Madison, Leighia, Karynne, and Juliana.  Becca is kind, thoughtful,  and takes care of everyone - she is a great mom!

Beth:  Beth works in human resources at a university.  She is married and just recently had a baby girl, Gabrielle Alese.  Beth is really good at making people laugh and offers great advice.

Bonita:  Bonita is in the Air Force.  She is currently stationed in Tucson, Arizona.  She recently returned from being stationed in the Middle East, and is happy to be back with her husband and their son, Landon.  She is also a photographer.  Bonita is extremely smart and creative.

lenders.occupational_info:
We can handle income tax matters for individuals, couples, families and small business owners or professionals.

The objective of every tax return preparation and income tax planning engagement is to ensure you pay the lowest possible tax allowed by the tax rules this year and in future years, so your assets can grow. With 24 Hour Tax & Accounting you will know your reporting is correct and on time.

Your tax liability will be as low as legally possible. You can be assured that 24 Hour Tax & Accounting monitors the latest tax rulings that might affect your return. Come by, call or email us today for information regarding our services and options and one of our staff will get back to you.

lenders.occupational_info:
FUNDING FOR USA SMALL BUSINESS ASSISTANT EFFORT
To acknowledge the fundamental need for a regional national empowerment  of the arts; performing art theatrical company writers/actors workshop cultural plan  to establish a commission to examine the effect of research and development findings and determination there of., subsequently de jure and de facto economic development of low country Americans, and the impact of these forces on low country Americans, to make recommendations  NEA on appropriate remedies, and for other purposes. 

A working group of local representatives will develop a regional cultural plan.  Work with a cultural advisory committee to assess resources and develop a cultural plan .  Funds to implement programs to support a community cultural plan, 
INTRODUCTION OF THE ORGANIZATION 

Please contact any of these organizations direct to obtain a description of them and their involvement. these local groups will be empowered with the education , support and advocacy to ensure that there is fair treatment for all people with regard to the development, implementation, and enforcement of environmental policies.

Theses local community groups are committed to actively recruit members from the communities which they are apart of , and to response community forums/ discussion groups dealing specifically with performing art and the big budget motion picture industry, these  community forums / discussion group will focus on education and involvement in the ACS/AH

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: Unfortunately and with regret, I too will be withdrawing my funds from KIVA as they are repaid.  KIVA lenders have repeatedly asked the KIVA administration to remove loans that involve cockfighting, but they refuse to do so.  I understand that there are cultural differences, but animal cruelty is animal cruelty.  I have been a KIVA member for three years, spoke VERY highly of KIVA and have recruited other people as well, so it is with a heavy heart that I will no longer be supporting KIVA.

lenders.name: jackie

lenders.name: neuber.com
lenders.loan_because:
We loan because lots of people have helped up build one of the largest databases of Windows processes, files, spyware and rootkits on http://www.neuber.com and http://www.file.net.
◌◌◌◌◌
We want to pass their help on to people who really need it. 
◌◌◌◌◌
We are donating $1 for each new user comment left at http://www.neuber.com/taskmanager/process or http://www.file.net, because as each user comment helps us build a more valuable website, we in turn want to extend our help to hard-working people around the world so that their dreams may come true. 
◌◌◌◌◌
We loan without expecting a payback. A payback is a bonus, and will go to help another family.
◌◌◌◌◌
Up until now, we have helped 454 groups and individuals with more than $11,000.

lenders.occupational_info: Am simple,kind,caring,humble,and decent human being that devote and dedicated to my assigned duties.I want every one to help to change the world to be a better place for all of us to live,I am the Initiator/Coordinator - National Youth Empowerment Initiative-founded in 1998,President-Amigo Youth Forum Okoko Item - A Community Youth Organization - Founded in 2003,Member-Taking It Global Organization and Abia State Coordinator -The Love Foundation Nigeria Inc.U.S.A a non profit,non governmental organization that encourage all youths academically,connect them socially,support them financially,strengthened them with working opportunities,support them with strong moral character and educate youths on the danger of H.I.V/AIDS virus and other diseases,train and support those that lack sufficient learning/working opportunities, Initiate,Support and embark on any useful projects that will benefit our Communities and Globally, Patron-Abia 1, Aba District and 2nd Aba Company of Boys/Girls Brigade Nigeria of Christ Methodist Church Nigeria -21/25 Market Road,Aba, Abia-State in 1998 and presently The Local Lead Agency for Global Youth Action Network U.S.A on Global Youth Service Day 2005 and 2007(GYSD)

lenders.name: Alison & Chris
lenders.loan_because: we like to see people succeed in their own businesses.

lenders.name: Jay & Amy
lenders.loan_because: we are so excited to be part of what God is doing in people's lives - to help them achieve their dreams and make their families more prosperous.

lenders.name: Angie & Shannon
lenders.loan_because: poverty allows bad people to commit corruption and abuse  against the poor who are so busy trying to physically save their lives each day through the aquisition of food and shelter that they have no time to devote to creating the political and cultural changes neccessary to end their oppression by those who benefit greatly from abusing others, especially women and children.  Creating jobs is one of the most important things we can do for people everywhere.  Any of us familiar with US History know that job creation is vital to our freedom from oppression because rather than just struggling to survive each day  we  have time to monitor our  government through participation in the political proccess .  Without jobs we would be an oppressed third world nation subject to the abuse of the many who  are cruel enough to  oppress for their own profits and pleasures in life.  Jobs give us a voice and the opportunity to express it through our making of laws for our benefit as a society in whole rather than for the benefit of the 10 percent  of our population that would choose their selfish pleasures at the exzpense of anyone. Whether those are corrupt corporate leaders (most of whom are decent people), child molestors, corupt government officials, people who drink and drive and kill a person every 29 minutes in our country or whomever wants to be destructive for their own pleasure,  Our ability to have good paying jobs allows us a voice against their evil  and we hope that for you as well.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I are well paid laborers, cleaning homes and doing construction work. We participate in politics both local and national.  We love the outdoors.  Neither of us has any past or current addictions to substances that interfer with our achieving a high quality of life.  We love lots of outdoor activites and we love helping people. We live modestly so we can help others.  We also sponser a family in Africa.

lenders.loan_because:
I lost my dear wife to cancer at the young age of just 31. She cared so much for those who had fewer opportunities, and always wanted to help out in any way possible--even when she was so sick herself.

I am making my loans in her name, because it is something she would have believed in whole-heartedly---real people, all around the world, reaching out to help each other in their time of need.

lenders.occupational_info: I find money for people to buy homes.

lenders.name: Olga
lenders.loan_because: I started my own small publishing company with $1,700 over four years ago, and I'm still in business, so I know it can be done.
lenders.occupational_info: I find original, unusual novels that most mainstream publishers turn down because of the concern that they won't sell. My business model allows me to focus on content without worrying about the market figures - and keep my titles in print.

lenders.name: ken
lenders.loan_because: It takes a lot for someone to actively change their own life.  No matter what country you live in you should be afforded the opportunity of trust.
lenders.occupational_info: i help people find homes

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: i believe everyone deserves a chance to try and make it in this life, and if i can help i will.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because:
This money can be used better elsewhere, especially where it's "worth more" by being able to do more.  What can you buy with the same amount here in the US?...almost nothing as worthwhile as what it can be used for by these loan recipients.
And it's much more exciting than betting at the track.  Better returns too!
lenders.occupational_info: I transport documents, film, and other things around my city for people and businesses, from office to office or home when they need it urgently.

lenders.name: Helen and Jeff
lenders.loan_because: We are grateful for all that we've been blessed with and want to help others become financially stable.
lenders.occupational_info: Jeff and Helen are both accountants.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: All Saints have a past and all Sinners have a future.  By the Grace of God go I.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and run and auto repair shop.  I believe that people like to be treated the way I'd wish to be treated.

lenders.name: Jacquie
lenders.loan_because: none of us are free until we're all free.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: a small loan can bring one person out of poverty
lenders.occupational_info: Project manager with the UN

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of donating some of my relative wealth to people needing a leg up to earn the same for themselves, their families and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct investigations for attorneys defending people accused of crimes. I conduct investigations for attorneys and others in civil matters.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: Change happens one person at a time.

lenders.name: Drake
lenders.loan_because: I believe that access to finance opportunities ought not to be available just for the rich and privileged. Resources ought to be available for all driven people to lift themselves to a higher condition.
lenders.occupational_info: I consult on IT issues for the US government related to collaborating more efficiently with the citizens they represent.

lenders.name: Becky
lenders.occupational_info: Happy, kind and hard working

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping other people, especially people who have the will and initiative to help themselves.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: This IS the way to uplift Africa and many other impoverished countries. Giving billion dollar grants to corrupt govts achieves NOTHING other than enriching the rulers. They NEVER do anything for their people.
lenders.occupational_info: Advisor, Investor to small medium size business.

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: The only way I would be happier than making this loan is if I were working for Kiva helping facilitate the loans and the only way I could be happier than that is if I had created this brilliant system myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I answer all calls received at our police station emergency to administration, as well as working the radio ensuring the safety of our officers, background research, direct people who walk in the station and maintain our national database records.  When there is time to chat with those around me I discover what a great team I am working for. We have lots of laughs which helps to relieve the stress.

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I have been very blessed by the Lord in our lives and we want to do what we can to help others accomplish their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a business that recruits senior level executives for companies in the Life Sciences area and my husband is a senior financial professional for a technology company.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: To give something back to society.
lenders.occupational_info: Of completely no use to society.

lenders.name: The Ingalls
lenders.loan_because: you should help your neighbor.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I loan in honor of those that came before me and the lessons learned from observing their willingness to help those in need.....and to add another voice of approval and gratitude to those that have invented such a place as this!!
lenders.occupational_info: My passions are my family and my collecting habits.
